testcase.classname: System should allow user to navigate on HomePage
testcase.name: US01_TC01 HomePage navigation
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the homepage "https://www.fazlagida.com/"................passed Given User scroll down to the second page...................................passed And User scroll slowly to the bottom of the page............................passed And And User clicks on the FACEBOOK link....................................passed Then User navigate back to the homepage.....................................passed And User clicks on the TWITTER page.........................................passed Then User navigate back to the homepage.....................................passed And User click the button of UP.............................................passed

testcase.classname: System should allow user to navigate all links on header
testcase.name: US02_TC01 Header Links Test
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the homepage "https://www.fazlagida.com/"................passed Given User clicks the Atik Olmasin link on HomePage.........................passed And User clicks the Hakkimizda Link.........................................passed And User clicks Gida Isletmeleri link on homepage...........................passed And User clicks Gida Bankalari link on HomePage.............................passed And User clicks Kariyer link on Homepage....................................passed And User clicks on Bize Ulasin link on HomePage.............................passed And User clicks on App link on HomePage.....................................passed

testcase.classname: System should allow user talk with expert.
testcase.name: US03_TC01 Uzmanla Gorusun Testi
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the homepage "https://www.fazlagida.com/"................passed Given User clicks the Atik Olmasin link on HomePage.........................passed Then User clicks the Uzmanimizla Gorusun link...............................passed And User enters name and surname on adi Soyadi Textbox "Ali Can"............passed And User enters Company Name on Firma Adi Textbox "TestOtomation"...........passed And User enters E-mail on E-posta Textbox "alicanbelli@gmail.com"...........passed And User enters phoneNumber on adi Telefon "905552112211"...................passed And User enters product name on adi Urun Adi "Ekmek"........................passed Then User selects Atik Urun.................................................passed And User enters amount on Miktar TextBox"3 ton".............................passed And User enters Location on Lokasyon TextBox"Ankara"........................passed Then User selects the Urunleri hayvan barinaklarina bagisliyorum............passed
